author: jason.carver
content: Oof, the optimizer in me is irritated to have to use uint16 instead of uint8 for the findnodes distances, just to support 256. I don't immediately see a better solution than hacking it by removing one of the options (like do we really need a distance of 1-bit away? so we could just skip it and start at 2->256, and shift it to 1->255). A hacky solution probably isn't worth saving a byte on each distance parameter, it's just bugging me.
